alert.note: Alert for Calumet; Manitowoc; Outagamie (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Calumet, southeastern Outagamie and central Manitowoc Counties through 945 PM CDT... At 844 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near High Cliff State Park, or 9 miles southeast of Appleton, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Brillion around 900 PM CDT. Valders and St. Nazianz around 915 PM CDT. Manitowoc around 925 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include St Nazianz, Killsnake Wildlife Area, Kellners Corners, Two Rivers, Madsen, Reedsville, Grimms, Taus, Newtonberg and Maple Grove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
